table_description: Contains employee performance review data including overall ratings, skill-specific ratings, reviewer information, and review periods from 2023 to 2024.
use_cases: Analyze performance by specific skill categories
Compare performance across departments or positions
data_quality_notes: All rating fields are DECIMAL(3,2) with CHECK constraint BETWEEN 1 AND 5
overall_rating is required, skill-specific ratings can vary
reviewer_id references employees.employee_id - typically the employee's manager
Use MAX(review_date) subquery to get employee's latest review
review_period_start and review_period_end define the evaluation period (typically 6 months)

table_columns.name: review_id
table_columns.description: Primary key. Unique identifier for each performance review.

table_columns.name: employee_id
table_columns.description: Foreign key to employees table. References the employee being reviewed.

table_columns.name: review_date
table_columns.description: Date when the review was conducted. Format: YYYY-MM-DD.

table_columns.name: reviewer_id
table_columns.description: Foreign key to employees table. References the employee conducting the review (typically the manager).

table_columns.name: review_period_start
table_columns.description: Start date of the period being reviewed. Format: YYYY-MM-DD.

table_columns.name: review_period_end
table_columns.description: End date of the period being reviewed. Format: YYYY-MM-DD.

table_columns.name: overall_rating
table_columns.description: Overall performance rating on a scale of 1.00 to 5.00. Higher is better. Required field.

table_columns.name: technical_skills_rating
table_columns.description: Rating for technical skills on a scale of 1.00 to 5.00. Can be NULL.

table_columns.name: communication_rating
table_columns.description: Rating for communication skills on a scale of 1.00 to 5.00. Can be NULL.

table_columns.name: teamwork_rating
table_columns.description: Rating for teamwork and collaboration on a scale of 1.00 to 5.00. Can be NULL.

table_columns.name: leadership_rating
table_columns.description: Rating for leadership abilities on a scale of 1.00 to 5.00. Can be NULL.

table_columns.name: comments
table_columns.description: Reviewer's detailed comments and feedback about the employee's performance. Can be NULL.

table_columns.name: goals_next_period
table_columns.description: Goals and objectives set for the next review period. Can be NULL.
